endings.title: The Corporate Victory
endings.tagline: Order through strength. Prosperity through control.
endings.description: You sided with IVRC and Director Thorne, helping the corporation defeat all opposition. The frontier is now firmly under corporate control. Workers have security but no freedom. You've risen to power, but at what cost?

conditions.description: Made the choice to side with Thorne
Did not ally with the Copperheads

characterFates.description: Thorne consolidates power over the entire region. With your help, IVRC becomes the undisputed authority. He rewards your loyalty with wealth and position.
Diamondback is captured and hanged for her crimes. Even at the gallows, she refuses to repent, dying as she lived - defiant.
Samuel dies without seeing justice. The documents are lost in the chaos, and his sacrifice is forgotten by all but a few.
Sheriff Cole survives, but the corruption ran too deep. He turns in his badge, unable to serve a system he no longer trusts.
Clara survives but struggles to find her place in the new order. Her association with the mines haunts her.
Maggie dies in the fighting, her potential cut short. Samuel mourns the loss of another generation to the conflict.

epilogueSlides.title: Victory for Progress
epilogueSlides.text: IVRC's banner flies over every town in the territory. With your help, Director Thorne crushed all opposition. The mines run day and night, feeding the insatiable appetite of industry.

epilogueSlides.title: The Price of Progress
epilogueSlides.text: The workers toil under strict company rule. The wages are fair, Thorne keeps his promises, but the freedom they once dreamed of is now just a memory. Efficiency has replaced hope.

epilogueSlides.title: Your Reward
epilogueSlides.text: Thorne promotes you to Regional Overseer. A grand office, a generous salary, the power to shape the frontier's future. You've won. But sometimes, late at night, you hear the echoes of promises broken.

epilogueSlides.title: The Corporate Frontier
epilogueSlides.text: The railroad expands. The towns grow. Prosperity comes to those who serve the company well. The frontier is tamed, but was it worth the cost? Only history will judge.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people and killed {peopleKilled}. You completed {questsCompleted} quests in {daysSurvived} days. The corporation thanks you for your service.

endings.title: The Revolution
endings.tagline: Freedom through fire. Liberation through blood.
endings.description: You joined Diamondback's Copperhead rebellion and helped overthrow IVRC through violent revolution. The workers are free, but chaos reigns. The old order is destroyed, but the new one is built on blood.

conditions.description: Significant body count from the revolution

characterFates.description: Thorne is executed by the revolutionary forces. His reign of terror ends at the end of a rope, witnessed by those he oppressed.
Diamondback achieves her dream of freedom for the workers. She becomes a folk hero, though the cost was high. Her name is sung in saloons across the frontier.
Samuel survives but the revolution took its toll. He lost too many friends to violence to call it victory.
Sheriff Cole dies defending the innocent during the final confrontation. His sacrifice is not forgotten.
Clara survives but struggles to find her place in the new order. Her association with the mines haunts her.
Maggie becomes a leader of the new workers' movement, carrying on her grandfather's dream with youthful fire.

epilogueSlides.title: The Uprising
epilogueSlides.text: The workers rise. Led by Diamondback and fueled by years of oppression, they storm IVRC's strongholds. The streets run red with the blood of oppressors and innocents alike.

epilogueSlides.title: Thorne Falls
epilogueSlides.text: Director Thorne is dragged from his mansion. His execution is swift but not merciful. The workers cheer, but you see the horror in the eyes of those who wanted justice, not vengeance.

epilogueSlides.title: Freedom and Chaos
epilogueSlides.text: Diamondback's vision is realized, but at terrible cost. The old order is shattered, but the new one struggles to form. Rival factions compete for power. Freedom has come, but peace has not.

epilogueSlides.title: The Revolutionary's Dilemma
epilogueSlides.text: You helped birth this new world. The chains are broken, but the road ahead is uncertain. Was the blood worth the freedom? Only time will tell if this revolution devours its children.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people and killed {peopleKilled} in the revolution. {questsCompleted} quests completed in {daysSurvived} days of struggle. The revolution remembers.

endings.title: The Peaceful Reform
endings.tagline: Justice through truth. Freedom through law.
endings.description: You helped Samuel expose IVRC's crimes through proper legal channels. The documents he protected for years brought down the corporation without bloodshed. Change is slow, but lasting.

characterFates.description: Thorne is arrested and tried for his crimes. The evidence you gathered ensures a fair trial, and he is sentenced to life imprisonment.
Diamondback accepts a pardon in exchange for testimony against Thorne. She takes a new name and starts a quiet life, though her eyes still burn with fire.
Samuel lives to see his dream realized. The documents he protected for years finally brought justice. He spends his final days in peace, surrounded by free workers.
Sheriff Cole sees justice served through the proper channels. His faith in the law is restored, and he continues to protect the innocent.
Clara uses her skills to help rebuild. Her inventions improve the lives of workers across the region.
Maggie becomes a leader of the new workers' movement, carrying on her grandfather's dream with youthful fire.

epilogueSlides.title: The Documents
epilogueSlides.text: Samuel's documents are finally revealed. Years of evidence: forged contracts, stolen wages, deaths covered up. The newspapers print every word. The nation is outraged.

epilogueSlides.title: The Trial
epilogueSlides.text: Federal marshals arrive to arrest Thorne. The trial is long and painful, but justice is served. IVRC is broken up, its assets distributed to the workers it exploited.

epilogueSlides.title: Samuel's Dream
epilogueSlides.text: Old Samuel lives to see it all. Miners own their own claims. Towns govern themselves. It's not perfect, and change is slow, but the dream is real. He can rest now.

epilogueSlides.title: A Better Tomorrow
epilogueSlides.text: The frontier changes slowly but surely. Schools open. Churches fill. Families put down roots. You helped build something that will last - not through violence, but through truth.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people while keeping casualties to {peopleKilled}. {questsCompleted} quests completed in {daysSurvived} days. The truth set them free.

endings.title: The Lawman's Justice
endings.tagline: The law is the law. Even on the frontier.
endings.description: You worked within the system to bring Thorne to justice. Sheriff Cole's faith in the law is restored. Order is maintained, and justice is served through proper channels.

characterFates.description: Thorne is arrested and tried for his crimes. The evidence you gathered ensures a fair trial, and he is sentenced to life imprisonment.
Diamondback is captured but spared execution. She spends her days in prison, planning her next escape.
Samuel lives to see his dream realized. The documents he protected for years finally brought justice. He spends his final days in peace, surrounded by free workers.
Sheriff Cole sees justice served through the proper channels. His faith in the law is restored, and he continues to protect the innocent.
Clara uses her skills to help rebuild. Her inventions improve the lives of workers across the region.
Maggie becomes a leader of the new workers' movement, carrying on her grandfather's dream with youthful fire.

epilogueSlides.title: The Arrest
epilogueSlides.text: Sheriff Cole leads the posse himself. With evidence you gathered, he arrests Thorne in his own office. 'You're coming with me, Thorne. The law still means something here.'

epilogueSlides.title: Due Process
epilogueSlides.text: The trial is a landmark. Witnesses testify. Evidence is presented. The jury deliberates. For once, the system works as it should. Thorne is found guilty on all counts.

epilogueSlides.title: The Sheriff's Faith
epilogueSlides.text: Cole pins his badge back on with pride. 'The law bent, but it didn't break,' he says. 'As long as there are people willing to fight for it, justice will prevail.'

epilogueSlides.title: Order Restored
epilogueSlides.text: The frontier remains wild, but it's a bit more just. Deputies patrol the roads. Courts hear grievances. It's not perfect, but the badge means something again.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people and brought {peopleKilled} criminals to justice. {questsCompleted} quests completed in {daysSurvived} days. The law prevails.

endings.title: The Exodus
endings.tagline: Freedom through departure. Victory through absence.
endings.description: You helped the underground railroad evacuate workers from IVRC's territory. Without a workforce, Thorne's empire collapsed. Freedom was found not through conflict, but through escape.

characterFates.description: Thorne loses everything but his life. Stripped of power and wealth, he wanders the frontier a broken man.
Diamondback leaves the region, knowing her fight is over here. She rides into the sunset, seeking new frontiers and new causes.
Samuel leaves with the exodus, finally free of the mines that took his son. He finds peace in a new land, far from the frontier.
Sheriff Cole leaves the region, seeking a town that still believes in justice. The frontier has broken too many of his ideals.
Clara leaves with the exodus, taking her technical knowledge to a new frontier where she can start fresh.
Maggie leaves with her grandfather, eager to build something new rather than fight over the old.
Doc Chen continues his work in the new settlements, finally able to practice medicine without fear.
Father Miguel builds a new church in the refugee settlement, his flock free at last.

epilogueSlides.title: The Underground
epilogueSlides.text: Doc Chen's network activates. Father Miguel's church becomes a waystation. Sister Maria forges papers. In the dead of night, the workers begin to leave.

epilogueSlides.title: The Empty Mines
epilogueSlides.text: IVRC wakes to find their workforce gone. Mines stand silent. Fields lie fallow. Without workers to exploit, Thorne's empire crumbles from within.

epilogueSlides.title: New Horizons
epilogueSlides.text: The refugees find new homes in the north and west. They build communities free from corporate control. The frontier is vast, and freedom waits for those bold enough to seek it.

epilogueSlides.title: The Guide
epilogueSlides.text: You helped them escape. Every family that found freedom owes you a debt they can never repay. Somewhere out there, your name is spoken with reverence around new hearths.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people through the underground railroad. Only {peopleKilled} lives were lost. {questsCompleted} quests in {daysSurvived} days. Freedom awaits in the west.

endings.title: The Lone Wolf
endings.tagline: Trust no one. Serve no cause but your own.
endings.description: You rejected all factions, refused all alliances, and carved your own path through the conflict. The region descends into chaos as you ride away, an anti-hero with no allegiances.

characterFates.description: Thorne flees the region as his empire crumbles. He takes what wealth he can carry and disappears into the east, a wanted man.
Diamondback leaves the region, knowing her fight is over here. She rides into the sunset, seeking new frontiers and new causes.
Samuel survives but the revolution took its toll. He lost too many friends to violence to call it victory.
Sheriff Cole survives, but the corruption ran too deep. He turns in his badge, unable to serve a system he no longer trusts.
Clara survives but struggles to find her place in the new order. Her association with the mines haunts her.
Maggie dies in the fighting, her potential cut short. Samuel mourns the loss of another generation to the conflict.

epilogueSlides.title: No Masters
epilogueSlides.text: You refused them all. Thorne's money. Diamondback's cause. Samuel's patience. Cole's badge. None of them could claim you. None of them could use you.

epilogueSlides.title: The Reckoning
epilogueSlides.text: You faced Thorne alone. Not for justice, not for revolution, not for freedom - for yourself. Whatever happened in that final confrontation, you did it your way.

epilogueSlides.title: Chaos Descends
epilogueSlides.text: Without a unified front, the region descends into chaos. Factions tear each other apart. Towns burn. The frontier becomes more dangerous than ever.

epilogueSlides.title: Ride Into the Sunset
epilogueSlides.text: You saddle up and ride out. Behind you, the frontier tears itself apart. Ahead, endless horizon. You're nobody's hero, nobody's villain. Just a stranger passing through.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people - or was it just yourself? {peopleKilled} fell to your gun. {questsCompleted} quests, {daysSurvived} days. Now you ride alone.

endings.title: The True Peace
endings.tagline: Unity in diversity. Peace through understanding.
endings.description: Through incredible effort and wisdom, you united the warring factions. No one got everything they wanted, but everyone got something they needed. True peace was achieved.

characterFates.description: Thorne is exiled rather than executed. He leaves with his life but nothing else, a mercy he never showed others.
Diamondback accepts a role in the new council. Her fire now builds rather than destroys.
Samuel lives to see his dream realized. The documents he protected for years finally brought justice. He spends his final days in peace, surrounded by free workers.
Sheriff Cole sees justice served through the proper channels. His faith in the law is restored, and he continues to protect the innocent.
Clara uses her skills to help rebuild. Her inventions improve the lives of workers across the region.
Maggie becomes a leader of the new workers' movement, carrying on her grandfather's dream with youthful fire.

epilogueSlides.title: An Unlikely Alliance
epilogueSlides.text: Against all odds, you brought them together. Diamondback and Sheriff Cole. Samuel and Thorne's reform-minded lieutenant. Enemies sat at the same table and found common ground.

epilogueSlides.title: The Compromise
epilogueSlides.text: No one got everything they wanted. Thorne was exiled, not executed. Workers gained rights, not ownership. The law bent, but held. It wasn't perfect - it was real.

epilogueSlides.title: The Peacemaker
epilogueSlides.text: They call you the Peacemaker now. The one who proved that even on the frontier, enemies can become partners. That justice and mercy can coexist.

epilogueSlides.title: A New Dawn
epilogueSlides.text: The frontier will always be wild. But today, it is also hopeful. You built something rare - a peace that might just last. Not through force, but through understanding.

endings.statisticsTemplate: You saved {peopleSaved} people and lost only {peopleKilled}. {questsCompleted} quests completed in {daysSurvived} days. You achieved what no one thought possible.
